short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides unweighted, estimate grades in enrolled courses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides an unweighted calculation for your classes during each semester. After installing this tool, an additional grade calculation will appear under each currently enrolled course.

⚠ Your actual grade depends on the grading system your class uses, so this is not guaranteed to be 100% accurate until a manual weights feature is added.

DISCLAIMER:
"UMBC - Grade Viewer" is an autonomous Chrome extension that is not associated with or subsidized by the University of Maryland, Baltimore County (UMBC). It was designed only for students who attend UMBC. The Extension is not supported or endorsed by UMBC and exists as its own separate entity. The Extension is designed solely for the benefit of UMBC students and does not gather any personally identifiable information or track browsing history.

For any issues or inquires: habib.inq.a@gmail.com
